forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 7C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 45F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early. Decreasing clouds overnight. Low 2C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this evening. Partial clearing overnight. Low near 35F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and some clouds. High 9C. Winds NNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 49F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear. Low 3C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening with clear skies overnight. Low 37F. Winds NNE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 11C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 52F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies with a few passing clouds. Low 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High around 10C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 51F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional showers. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by mostly cloudy skies and a few showers later at night. Low 42F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 41F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High near 10C. SE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 50F. SE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low around 5C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 42F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
